topComments.author: john Coccia
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Visitou a playa del Duque como um casal. Ador√°vel praia de areia √≠ntima no sul de Tenerife, na costa de Adeje. Cheguei l√° por volta das 10h30 e muitos se as camas j√° estavam em uso. No entanto, temos uma cama de sol de cabana. Parece povoado mais por adultos do que crian√ßas. As espregui√ßadeiras custam cerca de ‚Ç¨ 25 para dois e as cabanas custam ‚Ç¨ 55 - os pre√ßos s√£o para o dia inteiro. Os guarda-s√≥is fixos tamb√©m est√£o presentes. A praia √© grande o suficiente para que voc√™ possa chegar e usar suas pr√≥prias toalhas. Alguns comerciantes de praia apresentam-se a passear e a tentar vender-lhe as suas mercadorias. Pode ser irritante, mas tamb√©m conveniente se voc√™ quiser algo. Vendedores de bebidas andando por a√≠ gritando ‚Äúcoca, Fanta, birra‚Äù, mas acho que voc√™ vai encontrar isso na maioria das praias tur√≠sticas agora. Massagistas oferecendo massagens a v√°rios pre√ßos. Tivemos uma massagem nas costas e pesco√ßo que custou ‚Ç¨ 10 por cerca de 15 minutos. O cara do coquetel tamb√©m foi um comerciante bem-vindo, fornecendo cordas e mojitos bem feitos por ‚Ç¨ 5 cada. A ba√≠a at√© a praia era cercada em cada ponta por rochas e dependendo da hora do dia as ondas podem ser bem grandes com correntes fortes, mas equilibrando isso com outros momentos em que a √°gua √© bastante calma. H√° um bar de praia se voc√™ estiver com fome e lojas a uma curta dist√¢ncia a p√©. Uma linda armadilha de sol e um lindo dia passado ao sol na praia. Com certeza vai voltar  (Original) Visited playa del Duque as a couple. Lovely intimate, sandy beach in southern Tenerife on the costa Adeje. Got there about 10.30 and many if the beds were already in use. However, we got a cabana sun bed. Seems populated more by adults than children. Sun beds are around ‚Ç¨25 for two and the cabanas were ‚Ç¨55 - prices being for the whole day. Fixed sun shades also present. The beach is big enough though that you can just arrive and use your own towels. Some beach traders present walking around and trying to sell you their wares. Can be annoying but also convenient if you want something. Drinks sellers walking around shouting ‚Äúcoca, Fanta, birra‚Äù but I think you‚Äôll find that in most tourist beaches now. Masseurs offering massages at various prices. We had a back and neck massage which was ‚Ç¨10 for around 15 minutes. The cocktail guy was also a welcome trader supplying string, well made mojitos for ‚Ç¨5 each. The bay to the beach was surrounded each end by rocks and depending on the time of day the waves can be quite big with strong currents but balance that against other times where the water is quite calm. There is a beach bar if you‚Äôre hungry and shops within a short walking distance. A lovely sun trap and a lovely day spent in the sun on the beach. Will definitely be coming back

topComments.author: Jeremy Klamer
topComments.comment: This is the best beach we've been to so far. If you compare this to Playa del amaricanas for example, this has a much more classy vibe. The hustlers will only ask you once if you want to buy a new this or that. The sunbeds are royally equipped with a mattress and the umbrella is big enough to actually provide enough shade.There are even free clean toilets, can you imagine that!  All this comes at a price obviously. There is a underground parking garage close by at 1,80 an hour and you can shower for a modest 2,25. Haven't paid for the beds yet but I assume this will also be more than the usual. For me it's worth it!  Come early to secure a bed (preferably before 10 ish depending on the season)

topComments.comment: For me it‚Äôs the best beach on the South Coast of Tenerife! Very comfortable sun-beds with a mattresses a big umbrellas which can hide you all day from the sun.
